title: PathSim Blocks Configuration
description: Configuration for block extraction from a PathSim toolbox

importPath.description: Python import path for the blocks module (e.g., 'pathsim.blocks')

categories.description: Block categories mapping to block definitions

class.description: Python class name of the block

maxInputs.description: Maximum number of input ports (null for unlimited)

maxOutputs.description: Maximum number of output ports (null for unlimited)

defaultInputs.description: Default number of input ports when creating new instance

defaultOutputs.description: Default number of output ports when creating new instance

extraDocstrings.description: Additional classes to extract docstrings from (e.g., 'Subsystem', 'Interface')

ioOverrides.description: Manual port name overrides for blocks with complex port configurations
